description:
This is the one you have been searching for! Perfectly combining its ideal location, an abundance of internal and external living space and the added bonus of having all the modern inclusions and features this property is sure to impress upon inspection.

You will love..
* The open plan living area with plush carpet, abundance of natural light and AC
* The over sized main bedroom with AC, walk in robes and sparkling ensuite
* The generously sized second bedroom with built in robes and AC
* The entertainers balcony with a great outlook, a perfect spot to relax or entertain
* The sleek kitchen with stone bench tops, great cupboard space and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher
* The Main bathroom with large shower cavity. Internal laundry with dryer included
* Top floor perks, with extra high ceilings!
* Covered car parking
* Secure and well maintained complex, with Intercom access

This complex offers luxury living within the heart of Cannon Hill. Find yourself surrounded with sporting treasures such as Bill Cash Memorial Park and a short 1.5km journey from Cannon Hill Kmart Plaza.
Transport is readily available with Bus Stop #60 (Barrack Rd near Bombery St) a 150m walk from your front door step providing access to Bus Line #232 to Cannon Hill Interchange and Brisbane City - Edward St. Cannon Hill Train station not much further at a total of 350m from home.

This one is sure to tick all of the boxes! Please reach out if you have any queries and we look forward to assisting yourself in purchasing this gem.
